share on x pn penny bowden nichols. jun 10 at 1:42 pm aunt lottie was such a fun energetic lady. i remember her always being one of the first ones on the dance floor doing her jitterbug whether it be at a family reunion.. anniversary party.. or wedding reception. she will be missed. prayers to the family. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x patricia willey. jun 10 at 1:06 pm my mom called you the jitterbug and she was right. i know that no matter what it took, you were there for her. i remember finding you in the kitchen with the plunger and trying to help mom unstop the sink. you had it rough and you never felt sorry for yourself, you just pitched in and started cleaning up the mess. thomas and i really liked your spirit and i know it lives on in your children. so - have all the iced cold colas you want and please give my mom a hug from me. you were special. now i miss both of you. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 12. 10:00 am - 11:00 am short funeral home13 east grove street. delmar, de, us, 19940. get service. jun 12. 11:00 am short funeral home13 east grove street. delmar, de, us, 19940. get no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe short funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about
